summary: Add a Map button in the travelogue UI that navigates to the existing 2D map and displays the selected journey’s schedule items based on their input locations.

existing_features.title: In the Travelogue journey action row, add a new button labeled "Map" with a 2D/map-style icon, positioned next to the existing "Flying" button.

When the new "Map" button is clicked for a journey, switch the main explorer to the existing 2D map view and display all schedule items for that journey on the 2D map according to each schedule item’s input location.

Wire TraveloguePanel and LocationMapExplorer together with a callback/event so the Travelogue "Map" button can trigger 2D mode and provide the selected journey identifier and its schedule items (or enough data) to MapComponent for rendering.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add a 'Map' button (2D logo) next to the 'Flying' button in the travelogue UI.
On 'Map' button click, navigate to the existing 2D map and display all schedule items for that journey according to their input locations.

projectName: Add Map button in Travelogue to open 2D map with selected journey schedule items
